Html:
In my header file I have definitions like

/*Location connection handle */
typedef void *tLocConn;
Which result in the error
Error: Error processing post typedef types for BOOL: Expected token of type ParenClose but found Asterisk instead.
The generated NativeMethods.vb file only contains enums from the header file and no dllimports for functions.
The command line I am using is:
C:\Program Files\InteropSignatureToolkit>sigimp /includePath:"C:\Code\Shared Projects\vs2010\VstCalcTax\source" vst.h
Am I doing something wrong?
